full_sentence: Women, get a fucking grip on yourselves and just see the simple fact that you cannot understand how disturbing to a little boys psyche hearing his OWN mother talk like this. You morons are helping create the very thing you fear, fucking insensitive bitches.
I wish those fucked up racist arseholes would die, its what they deserve
To jews: I hope we never cross paths

I have to say that I think white people - especially white women - have done enough of a job of trivialising rape on their own, without any help from Moslems. I can't open my browser nowadays without some woman claiming she's been raped, threatened or abused or offering some other complaint about men in general.

This does look like an actual rape or sexual assault however - something of a novelty.

I hope the perpetrator is caught and punished.
